name: Same Day Delivery (CAGD)
description:
Welcome to your new job!

In Same Day Delivery, you take on the role of Sheldon, a nerdy alien who has just been hired by the popular delivery company "Amazerg". In order to survive and pay the bills, you gotta deliver packages, and you gotta do it fast. In this game, you will race around a large town and quickly drop off packages to different houses until all of your packages are delivered to avoid being fired. Use many tools such as driving, running, throwing packages, buying upgrades, and hitting pedestrians to achieve victory and rise the ranks from a lowly class C driver to the prestigious Same Day Delivery Driver!

The Team:

Lead Designer: Kevin Estes

Producer: Valerie Pfeffer

Programming: Weston Campbell and Sam Keeley

3D Art: Justin Wagner, Travis Wilson, Cyrus Swart, Michael Houghton, Patrick Yang

2D Art: Ruben Camp

Level Design: Michael Houghton, Christopher Hunt, Samantha Bocast

Animation: Ruben Camp

Sound Design: Patrick Yang

Controls:

  • WASD to Move/Steer
  • Mouse to Look Around
  • Shift to Sprint/Accelerate
  • F to Get in and Out of the Van
  • E to Pick Up and Place Packages
  • Left Click to Throw Packages

Download Instructions:

  1. Download the zip file and drag it onto your desktop
  2. Right Click it and select "Extract Here"
  3. Open the newly extracted folder
  4. Double-Click the middle file named "Same Day Delivery"
  5. If Windows defender pops up, click "More Info" then "Run Anyway"

Feedback Form

When you finish delivering, please take a minute to fill out our feedback form, we greatly appreciate it!
